meaningMnemonic: If something's got <kanji>charm</kanji> and is to your <kanji>taste</kanji>, then it's your <vocabulary>hobby</vocabulary>. Hobbies are activities that you find charming and develop a taste for.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
